column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aiwei says : " This should neutralize the shirshu toxins . "
#Text=Lin says : " How could you let this happen ?!
#Text=I do n't know how this happened .
#Text=Obviously this was a well - planned operation , so do n't blame me .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " We searched the entire estate .
#Text=There 's no sign of them .
#Text=" Lin says : " Well , keep looking !
#Text=" Aiwei says : " It would seem they had some inside knowledge of Zaofu .
#Text=They must 've been working with someone .
#Text=" Korra says : " The - the guards .
#Text=It had to be one of them .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " I agree .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Question them all !
#Text=Whoever betrayed my city will suffer the consequences !
#Text=" Aiwei says : " What is your full name ?
#Text=Where were you last night ?
#Text=Do you have any knowledge of the people who tried to kidnap the Avatar ?
#Text=" Zhu Guan says : " My name is Zhu Guan .
#Text=" Second guard says : " I was patrolling the south wall of the Beifong estates .
#Text=" Third guard says : " I have absolutely no knowledge of the people who tried to kidnap Korra .
#Text=" Varrick says : " What was I doing last night ?
#Text=Same thing I always do .
#Text=From nine to ten , I checked my body for ticks .
#Text=Lyme disease is a serious killer .
#Text=Then I did my nightly Varrick calisthenics , followed by thirty minutes of breath holding .
#Text=I filmed the whole thing if you want to watch it .
#Text="
